rules_text:
Flash, Defender
When this creature enters, return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Put two +1/+1 counters on each of them.
notes:
Resume!

Vivian’s ripped leather and chrome made her an icon of Wilhelm’s Folly. 

Vivian, Hopeful Pugilist
